title: Katie Price's forced to live in her garden's 'annexe' as mucky mansion is inhabitable
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Builders have moved into Katie Price 's mucky mansion to overhaul the crumbling property.

The former glamour girl, 41, who narrowly swerved bankruptcy last year, recently splashed out a massive £250,000 to do up her famously messy house.

According to The Sun, Katie's whole family have now been forced to live in the 'annexe', while builders have moved in for refurbishments.

(Image: Katie Price/Youtube)

The source revealed: "Work on Katie’s house has now gone on so long, she can’t really live in it at all.

"It’s all been ripped out and nothing works. It’s a building site – piles of rubbish and dust everywhere."

The renovations started last month despite recent rumours that Katie's broke however reports have now suggested that work on the property has come to a halt.

The source also revealed to the publication : "She’s basically living in one room with Harvey – when he’s there on weekends – and the kids when they’re not with their dads."

(Image: Katie Price/Youtube)

Katie originally bought the annexe for son Harvey, however it seems that this is the only habitable place until the work has finished.

The extreme makeover plans come just after Katie stunned fans with an eye-opening tour of her property that she posted to her new YouTube page.

The mother-of-five admitted her home in its current state was really 'mucky' as she showed off piles of clutter , filthy rooms and rotting food in her fridge.

During the filmed tour of her Surrey property, she addressed claims her house is in disarray, and admitted the house is in a mess because she's in the middle of renovations.

"Yes, it does look like a mucky mansion," she confessed.

But in her second video, the entrepreneur and budding vlogger spoke to her fans about what's next for the Surrey pad.

The businesswoman and model revealed she was planning to overhaul the mucky mansion and turn it into a luxury retreat fit for paying guests.

Previous reports suggested Katie could have been forced to sell off her mansion as well as all her beloved animals in a bid to help clear her debts.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The reality star also made headlines last week after she enjoyed spending the night at her former fiance Kris Boyson's house.

The former glamour model made the move after her most recent beau, builder Charles Drury , refused to sign a Non Disclosure Agreement to prevent him from spilling her secrets.

Katie has now unfollowed new toyboy Charles on Instagram .
description: The Pricey has splashed out on a revamp of her mucky home but builders have made it totally 'unlivable' so family have to sleep in annexe
